ai-tha-ap211:1.3_0: I remember it all the earth,
ai-tha-ap211:1.4_0: it was whole of this life.
ai-tha-ap211:2.2_0: rebirth into all states of existence is eradicated,
ai-tha-ap211:2.4_0: in the teaching of the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap211:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Posture.
ai-tha-ap211:6.1_0: for the (whole) supporting the Elder Nun Put Divinities’ senior monks,
